cards.title: Synthesist
setup: At the start of the game, place Bone of Iron, Vial of Mercury, and Heart of Iron into play in their Incapacitated sides.
gameplay: At the start of your turn, if you have no other active Heroes in play, flip one of your incapacitated relics and restore it to 9 HP.
After one of your other Heroes is incapacitated, move it under this card.
powers: One other Hero Target deals 1 Target 3 Infernal Damage and themselves 1 Infernal Damage.
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may play a card.
One hero may use a power.
One player may draw a card.
flippedGameplay: After this card is flipped to this side, incapacitate all of your other Heroes and move them under this card.

openingLines.default: The flow of power is unique here. I won't have you disrupting it.
